DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of cabergoline compared with levodopa in the treatment of patients with RLS.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Determine the Efficacy and Safety of Cabergoline for the Treatment of Patients With RLS
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of idiopathic RLS and had all 4 clinical manifestations of RLS Moderate to severe symptoms of RLS as indicated by an IRLSSGRS total score greater than or equal to 10 and a severity at night score of greater than or equal to 4 on an 11point RLS6 rating scale No previous treatment for RLS or dissatisfaction with their current therapy Not available
